Description.Text:
Position The family-run Hotel Armony grants its guests a relaxing holiday not far from Garda Lake, in the residential area of Desenzano del Garda, known for its popular tourist attractions, beautiful landscapes and spas.
This charming hotel welcomes you in an absolutely quiet place, in the countryside, not far from the main tourist sites.
Restaurant Rich buffet breakfast.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations The hotel offers facilities such as an Internet Point, free Wi-Fi connection, a beautiful garden, a pool and a bar where to relax after an amazing day on the shores of Garda Lake.
